name: The Halloween Shooter
description:
The Halloween Shooter was created to show how easy it is to make a game using unreal engine blueprinting system and the different aspects of game developments. This game is nowhere close to perfect, and some features might need improvements, but it does work as a base for inspiration for those trying to get into game development. If you are intrested in the creation of this game or how to get started, visit my youtube page

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfv8GudT6kc8_pgdW7qsofA

Features Avaliable:

Fully functional menu system

Infinite Waves system

Enemy Scan Ability

Weapon System

Collectables

How To Play:

After launch,  Head to the options /settings tab and costomise to your prefrence

Players Spawn with a weapon in hand

Elimate all enemies to advance wave

Collecting pumpkins alows players to buy weapons from the shop

Ability can be use to reveal location of enemies

On death, all progress made in game is reset 

Note (Difficulty does affects gameplay, Wave is infinite and so is the difficulty each wave)

How To Download:

Dowload Zip file.

Extract Zip file with any extractor eg(WinRar).

Run The HalloweenShooter Application.

Enjoy.
